languages.text: "Усмирять свой гневный дух. С заботой о протекторате справятся мои слуги, мне же стоит позаботиться, чтобы в моих руках были молельные четки, а не власть. Или оружие, которое я употреблю для защиты жителей Простора, а не их покарания".

"Subdue my wrathful spirit. My servants can see to the needs of my protectorate, while I must ensure that my hands hold prayer beads rather than the reins of power. And that, whatever weapon I wield, I use it to protect the people of the Expanse instead of smiting them."
languages.original_text: "Усмирять свой гневный дух. С заботой о протекторате справятся мои слуги, мне же стоит позаботиться, чтобы в моих руках были молельные четки, а не власть. Или оружие, которое я употреблю для защиты жителей Простора, а не их покарания".

traits.locale_text: "Subdue my wrathful spirit. My servants can see to the needs of my protectorate, while I must see to it that my hands hold prayer beads instead of reins of power. And that whatever weapon I wield, I use it to protect the people of the Expanse instead of smiting them."

"Subdue my wrathful spirit. My servants can see to the needs of my protectorate, while I must see to it that my hands hold prayer beads instead of reins of power. And that whatever weapon I wield, I use it to protect the people of the Expanse instead of smiting them."

"Subdue my wrathful spirit. My servants can see to the needs of my protectorate, while I must ensure that my hands hold prayer beads rather than the reins of power. And that, whatever weapon I wield, I use it to protect the people of the Expanse instead of smiting them."

"Subdue my wrathful spirit. My servants can see to the needs of my protectorate, while I must ensure that my hands hold prayer beads rather than the reins of power. And that, whatever weapon I wield, I use it to protect the people of the Expanse instead of smiting them."

"Subdue my wrathful spirit. My servants can see to the needs of my protectorate, while I must ensure that my hands hold prayer beads rather than the reins of power. And that, whatever weapon I wield, I use it to protect the people of the Expanse instead of smiting them."

languages.text: "Ich werde meinen wütenden Geist unterdrücken. Sollen sich meine Diener um die Bedürfnisse meines Protektorats kümmern, während ich sicherstelle, dass meine Hände anstelle der Zügel der Macht Gebetsperlen halten. Außerdem muss ich dafür sorgen, dass jede Waffe, die ich führe, die Bewohner der Ausdehnung schützt, anstatt sie zu zerschmettern."
languages.original_text: "Subdue my wrathful spirit. My servants can see to the needs of my protectorate, while I must ensure that my hands hold prayer beads rather than the reins of power. And that, whatever weapon I wield, I use it to protect the people of the Expanse instead of smiting them."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde meinen wütenden Geist unterdrücken. Sollen sich meine Diener um die Bedürfnisse meines Protektorats kümmern, während ich sicherstelle, dass meine Hände anstelle der Zügel der Macht Gebetsperlen halten. Außerdem muss ich dafür sorgen, dass jede Waffe, die ich führe, die Bewohner der Ausdehnung schützt, anstatt sie zu zerschmettern."

languages.text: « Dompter mon tempérament colérique. Mes serviteurs pourvoiront aux besoins de mon protectorat, et je veillerai à ce que mes mains tiennent un chapelet plutôt que les rênes du pouvoir. Quelle que soit l'arme que je serai amenée à brandir, je le ferai pour protéger les citoyens des Étendues, et non plus pour les châtier. »
languages.original_text: "Subdue my wrathful spirit. My servants can see to the needs of my protectorate, while I must ensure that my hands hold prayer beads rather than the reins of power. And that, whatever weapon I wield, I use it to protect the people of the Expanse instead of smiting them."

traits.locale_text: « Dompter mon tempérament colérique. Mes serviteurs pourvoiront aux besoins de mon protectorat, et je veillerai à ce que mes mains tiennent un chapelet plutôt que les rênes du pouvoir. Quelle que soit l'arme que je serai amenée à brandir, je le ferai pour protéger les citoyens des Étendues, et non plus pour les châtier. »

languages.text: 「我が怒りに満ちた精神を鎮めよ。我がしもべは私の保護量の需要を知ることはできるが、我が手は権力の手綱ではなく、祈りの宝珠を持つようにしなければならない。そして、私がどのような武器を振るうにせよ、彼らを打ちのめすのではなく、エクスパンスの人々を守るために使わねばならないのだ」
languages.original_text: "Subdue my wrathful spirit. My servants can see to the needs of my protectorate, while I must ensure that my hands hold prayer beads rather than the reins of power. And that, whatever weapon I wield, I use it to protect the people of the Expanse instead of smiting them."

traits.locale_text: 「我が怒りに満ちた精神を鎮めよ。我がしもべは私の保護量の需要を知ることはできるが、我が手は権力の手綱ではなく、祈りの宝珠を持つようにしなければならない。そして、私がどのような武器を振るうにせよ、彼らを打ちのめすのではなく、エクスパンスの人々を守るために使わねばならないのだ」

languages.text: «Subyugar la furia de mi espíritu. Mis sirvientes pueden encargarse de las necesidades de mi protectorado, y yo debo asegurarme de que mis manos sostengan instrumentos de oración, no las riendas del poder. Y que, sin importar el arma que posea, la utilice para proteger a la gente de la Extensión, no para castigarla».
languages.original_text: "Subdue my wrathful spirit. My servants can see to the needs of my protectorate, while I must ensure that my hands hold prayer beads rather than the reins of power. And that, whatever weapon I wield, I use it to protect the people of the Expanse instead of smiting them."

traits.locale_text: «Subyugar la furia de mi espíritu. Mis sirvientes pueden encargarse de las necesidades de mi protectorado, y yo debo asegurarme de que mis manos sostengan instrumentos de oración, no las riendas del poder. Y que, sin importar el arma que posea, la utilice para proteger a la gente de la Extensión, no para castigarla».

languages.text: “我要克制我愤怒的灵魂。我的仆人可以管理好我的王朝，而我必须保证我的手中紧握的不再是权力的缰绳，而是信仰的念珠。只要这样，无论我挥舞着怎样的武器，我都会守护武器的人民，而不是加害他们。”
languages.original_text: "Subdue my wrathful spirit. My servants can see to the needs of my protectorate, while I must ensure that my hands hold prayer beads rather than the reins of power. And that, whatever weapon I wield, I use it to protect the people of the Expanse instead of smiting them."

traits.locale_text: “我要克制我愤怒的灵魂。我的仆人可以管理好我的王朝，而我必须保证我的手中紧握的不再是权力的缰绳，而是信仰的念珠。只要这样，无论我挥舞着怎样的武器，我都会守护武器的人民，而不是加害他们。”

languages.text: "Kin dolu ruhumu yatıştıracağım. Hizmetkârlarım protektoramın ihtiyaçlarıyla ilgilenirken ellerim gücün dizginlerini değil, dua tespihlerini tutacak. Hangi silahı kuşanmış olursam olayım onu Enginlik'teki insanları korumak için kullanacağım, onları baskılamak için değil."
languages.original_text: "Subdue my wrathful spirit. My servants can see to the needs of my protectorate, while I must ensure that my hands hold prayer beads rather than the reins of power. And that, whatever weapon I wield, I use it to protect the people of the Expanse instead of smiting them."
